00043     public static function create( $sDataName, $oModel, $arColumns = array(), $arActions = array() )
00044     {
00045         return CHtml::tag( 'table', array( 'class' => 'dataGrid' ), self::getDataListRows( $oModel, $arColumns ) );
00046     }
00047 
00048     /***
00049     * Builds a row for a data list
00050     * If a column name is prefixed with an '@', it will be stripped and the column will be a link to the 'update' view
00051     * 
00052     * @param array $arModel
00053     * @param array $arColumns
00054     * @param array $arActions
00055     * @param string $sDataName
00056     * @return string
00057     */
00058     public static function getDataListRows( $oModel, $arColumns = array() )
00059     {
00060         $_sActions = $_bValue = $_sTD = $_sOut = null;
00061         $_sPK = $oModel->getTableSchema()->primaryKey;
00062             
00063         //  Build columns
00064         foreach ( $arColumns as $_sColumn )
00065         {
00066             $_bLink = false;
00067             $_oValue = null;
00068 
00069             foreach ( self::$m_arTransform as $_sChar => $_sMethod )
00070             {
00071                 if ( $_sColumn{0} == $_sChar )
00072                 {
00073                     list( $_sColumn, $_oValue, $_bLink ) = self::$_sMethod( $oModel, $_sColumn );
00074                     break;
00075                 }
00076             }
00077 
00078             if ( ! $_oValue ) $_oValue = $oModel->{$_sColumn};
00079                 
00080             $_oValue = ( $_bLink || $_sPK == $_sColumn ) ?
00081                 CHtml::link( $_oValue, array( 'update', $_sPK => $oModel->{$_sPK} ) ) 
00082                 :
00083                 CHtml::encode( $_oValue );
00084 
00085             $_sOut .= '<tr><th class="label">' . CHtml::encode( $oModel->getAttributeLabel( $_sColumn ) ) . '</th><td>' . $_oValue . '</td></tr>';
00086         }
00087             
00088         return $_sOut;
00089     }
00090 
00091     protected static function linkTransform( $oModel, $sColumn )
00092     {
00093         $_sColumn = substr( $sColumn, 1 );
00094         return array( $_sColumn, null, true );
00095     }
00096     
00097     protected static function boolTransform( $oModel, $sColumn )
00098     {
00099         $_sColumn = substr( $sColumn, 1 );
00100         $_oValue = $oModel->{$_sColumn};
00101         $_oValue = ( ! $_oValue || $_oValue = 'N' || $_oValue = 'n' || $_oValue == 0 ) ? 'No' : 'Yes';
00102         return array( $_sColumn, $_oValue, false );
00103     }
00104     
00105     protected static function timeTransform( $oModel, $sColumn )
00106     {
00107         $_sColumn = substr( $sColumn, 1 );
00108         $_oValue = date( "F d, Y", $oModel->{$_sColumn} );
00109         return array( $_sColumn, $_oValue, false );
00110     }
